scripts.test: SET NODE_ENV=test&& mocha -r tsx -r dotenv/config -r chai/register-expect.js -r ./test/bull/fixtures.ts -r ./test/frank/fixtures.ts --exit --recursive ./test/**/*.ts
scripts.testbull: SET NODE_ENV=test&& mocha -r tsx -r dotenv/config -r chai/register-expect.js -r ./test/bull/fixtures.ts --exit --recursive ./test/bull/**/*.ts
scripts.testfrank: SET NODE_ENV=test&& mocha -r tsx -r dotenv/config -r chai/register-expect.js -r ./test/frank/fixtures.ts --exit --recursive ./test/frank/**/*.ts
scripts.bull: nodemon --exec "swc bull -d build/bull --copy-files --strip-leading-paths -C module.type=commonjs" -e ts,json --watch bull
scripts.frank: nodemon --exec "swc frank -d build/frank --copy-files --strip-leading-paths -C module.type=commonjs" -e ts,json --watch frank
